details: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming, including variables, data types, control structures, and basic algorithms.
Explore the world of web development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Build your first website from scratch.
Dive into data analysis, visualization, and machine learning using Python and popular libraries like Pandas and Matplotlib.
Master the essentials of JavaScript programming, including variables, functions, DOM manipulation, and event handling.
Become a full-stack web developer by learning both front-end (React) and back-end (Node.js) development.
Start your journey into Java programming. Learn about classes, objects, inheritance, and exception handling.
Focus on Python's data analysis capabilities. Use libraries like NumPy and Pandas to work with data effectively.
Learn front-end web development with Vue.js framework. Create interactive and dynamic web applications.
Explore C# programming and use Unity game engine to create 2D and 3D games for various platforms.
